src/mar_behave.vhd File Reference

Memory Address Register (MAR). More...

Architectures

MAR Entity
behave Architecture

Detailed Description

Memory Address Register (MAR).

It is part of the processor memory. During a computer run, the address in the PC is latched into the MAR.
A bit later, the MAR applies this 4-bit address to the RAM, where a read operation is performed.

Generated on Wed Apr 11 09:49:17 2012 for Microprocessor 8-bit by  1.6.3
